name: In the Matter of DISCIPLINE OF Jon Charles COOPER.

court.name: Supreme Court of the United States

parties: In the Matter of DISCIPLINE OF Jon Charles COOPER.

opinions.text: Jon Charles Cooper, of Washington, District of Columbia, is suspended from the practice of law in this Court and a rule will issue, returnable within 40 days, requiring him to show cause why he should not be disbarred from the practice of law in this Court.

casebody.head_matter:
In the Matter of DISCIPLINE OF Jon Charles COOPER.
No. D-2835.
Supreme Court of the United States
June 29, 2015.
Opinion
